message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to consider $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you consider that?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on too much. I can offer it to you for $135. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
